A clean and elegant way to explore your own or others' code effortlessly.  

</div>

## Features ‚ú®  

- **üîé Search**: Easily find any repository and explore its code.  
- **üìå Pinned Repos**: View the pinned repositories of any GitHub user.  
- **üï∂ Theme Switching**: Choose between dark and light mode for a comfortable viewing experience.  
- **üåê Iframe Support**: If permitted, seamlessly preview websites within an iframe.
